    Interdisciplinary Quantum Materials

    We focus on the solid-state theory, quantum simulation, and machine learning for quantum materials.

    Share

    AI speeds up the discovery of energy and quantum materials

    Our work in the AI for optical prediction and quantum material was selected by Tohoku University news, etc. with the title “AI speeds up the discovery of energy and quantum materials”.

    Nikken news in Japanese: “東北大、材料発見を大幅にスピードアップできるAIモデルを開発”.

    More information: N. T. Hung et al. Universal ensemble-embedding graph neural network for direct prediction of optical spectra from crystal structures, Adv. Mat. 2409175-1-11 (2024).

    15 Oct 2024
